name: Chili Pepper
watering_notes: Soil should be kept moist, but not wet
water around every 2-3 days during growth
fertilizing_notes: Dilute fertilizer until plants reach about 30cm in size
pruning_notes: Can be pruned at any time, but pruning is not necessary
To prevent bushiness, remove extra side shoots
To prevent legginess, trim main shoot
Keeping a plant smaller can help gaining more fruit
additional_notes: All chilis and bell peppers belong to this species
